segment: Privacy Statement    The Coffee Review is committed to preserving your privacy. The following statement discloses the information gathering and dissemination practices for the CoffeeReview.com website and the Coffee Review Marketplace.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment is an introductory statement about the privacy commitment of Coffee Review without specific details on practices.

segment: IP Addresses. We use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server, and to administer our Web site. Your IP address is used to help identify you and, in the case of the Coffee Review Marketplace, your shopping cart and to gather broad demographic information in the interest of improving our site and service.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection and use of IP addresses on the website for purposes such as diagnosing server issues, administering the website, identifying users, and improving services, indicating implicit collection of identifiable IP addresses for service operation and security.

segment: Cookies. A cookie is a unique identifier collected by the site to verify a return visitor's identity, or to understand how visitors navigate the site. The use of cookies is a standard practice on the Internet and most major web sites use them. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies; however, you can usually change your browser to prevent or notify you whenever you are sent a cookie. This gives you the chance to decide whether or not to accept the cookie.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of cookies to identify return visitors and understand navigation, which is collected on the website. Users have control over cookie acceptance through browser settings, indicating a choice scope of collection and choice type of browser/device privacy controls.

segment: The cookie itself does not tell us who you are, your email address, nor any other personal information. We use the information to improve our website and improve your experience while at our website.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that cookies are used, but they do not contain personal information. The purpose is to improve the website and user experience.

segment: Even without accepting cookies, you can access most of the features of the Coffee Review website. However, there may be some limitations on your use of some site functionality.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment explains that users can choose not to accept cookies and still access most features, indicating an opt-out option for cookie use, which affects the first party's use of data.

segment: Registration Forms. Our site's registration form requires users to give us contact information (like their name and e-mail address), financial information (like their account or credit card numbers), and demographic information (like their zip code and state). We use customer contact information from the registration form to send the user information about our company. The customer's contact information is also used to contact the visitor when necessary. Users may opt-out of receiving future e-mails; see the choice/opt-out section below. Financial information that is collected is used to check the users' qualifications for registration. Demographic and profile data is also collected at our site. We use this data to help us improve this website and our service.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of contact, financial, and demographic information during user registration on the website. The data is used for marketing, service operation, security, and research purposes. Users have an opt-out option for marketing emails.

segment: Online Surveys and Contests. From time to time, we may conduct online surveys to help us better understand and serve the needs of our customers. Our online surveys may ask visitors for contact information (like their e-mail address) and demographic information (like their zip code, age, or income level). With your permission, we may use contact data from our surveys to send the user information about our company. The customer's contact information is also used to contact the visitor when necessary. Users may always opt-out of receiving future e-mails.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of contact and demographic information through online surveys. Users can opt-out of receiving future emails, indicating both collection and use choices. The information is identifiable and collected explicitly for analytics and research purposes.

segment: Customer Service Correspondence. We may collect information that identifies you personally when you submit comments, questions or suggestions to our Customer Service department.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates the collection of identifiable personal information when users interact with customer service, which is used for service operation and security.

segment: Use of Your Personal and Non-Personal Information. Except as disclosed in this policy, we do not sell or disclose information that identifies our guests personally or makes it possible for other parties to contact them directly without our guests' consent. We may use, sell, disclose, or otherwise dispose of Personal Information we collect in the following circumstances:

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that the company collects personal information and may use, sell, or disclose it under certain circumstances, implying collection on their website.

segment: Legal Requirements. We may disclose personal information to conform with the law, respond to claims, enforce our policies, protect and defend our copyrights, trademarks, employees, and/or the unlawful use of our website.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the disclosure of personal information to comply with legal obligations, such as conforming with the law and responding to claims, which falls under the purpose of 'Legal requirement' in third-party sharing/collection.

segment: Other Emergencies. We may disclose personal information if we believe that an emergency involving danger of death or serious injury to any person requires disclosure of communications or justifies immediate disclosure of records.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses disclosing personal information in emergency situations involving danger of death or serious injury, which falls under an 'Other' purpose for third-party sharing or collection.

segment: Company Sale. Information collected through our website is considered proprietary information and a trade secret of the Coffee Review and the Coffee Review Marketplace. As the owner of this information, we may disclose or sell such information as an asset of the company in conjunction with the sale of the company or a substantial portion of our assets to a third party.

Policy Change.Change Type: In case of merger or acquisition

model_analysis.explanation: The segment discusses the potential disclosure or sale of collected information as an asset of the company in the event of a company sale or asset transfer, indicating a policy change in such scenarios.

segment: Aggregate Information. We collect Aggregate Information about you and your use of our Site whenever you visit us online. For instance, we may collect various forms of "click stream" information such as entry and exit points for our Site (i.e., referring URLs or domains), site traffic statistics, page views, impressions, and operating system and browser type. In addition, when users request pages on our Site, our servers automatically log their IP addresses. An IP address is a number that is automatically assigned to your computer whenever you are surfing the Web.

model_analysis.explanation: The policy segment describes the collection of aggregate information and IP addresses from users when they visit the website, indicating first-party data collection on the website.

segment: We may use third-party software that tracks traffic directed to CoffeeReview.com from affiliate Web sites and the purchases that result from this traffic. This information is aggregated and is not tied to an individual purchase.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of third-party software to track traffic and purchases from affiliate sites, indicating a third-party action. The information is aggregated, meaning it's not tied to individual users, and is used for analytics or research purposes.

segment: This aggregate Information generally will not personally identify you or be correlated to you individually for external purposes. We may collect, compile, store, publish, promote, report, sell, or otherwise disclose or use any and all aggregate Information, provided that, such information does not personally identify you. When we share such information with other companies, it is not traceable to any particular user, and will not be used to contact you. If we do correlate any aggregate Information to you, such information will be treated like any other personal Information under this policy.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection and use of aggregate information that does not personally identify individuals, indicating that the data is anonymized. It specifies that such information may be shared with other companies but is not traceable to any user, highlighting the use of aggregated data for purposes that are not explicitly detailed.

segment: Children. CoffeeReview.com is a general audience site that is not designed nor intended to collect personal information from children under the age of 13. To respect the privacy of children and to comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act, children under the age of 13 should not provide any personal information on this website. We ask that parents supervise their children while online.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment specifies that the website is not intended for children under 13 and mentions compliance with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act, indicating a focus on protecting children's privacy.
